name: search-cargo-packages
title: Search Cargo Packages
description: Search for cargo packages at crates.io and receive information about them.
author: runmaxde

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Cargo Packages
commands.subtitle: crates.io
commands.description:
Goal of this extension is to find cargo packages at crates.io. Afterwards you can copy the toml command, open the specific crates.io page or open the external documentation. ⚠️ Legal notice:
The used Logo is part of the rust-lang.org/cargo.io, learn more about the license at https://www.rust-lang.org/policies/media-guide
